author: Watsonite
title: Dull-cycle
review:
The Stuntz-series provides a bunch of colourful motorbikes and ditto minifigures with fun pullback action.
The Selfie Stunt Bike however is the dullest one in the batch.

The gold bike looks unappealing, the minifigure somewhat bland and the selfie stick doesn't hold the obligatory smartphone to take selfies with, but a regular camera... They could have used a cell phone tile instead.

Odd thing in my set was also that the print on the helmet is off to the side by a LOT.

Completionist-me asked to get all of them. Getting annoyed with completionist-me.
